content:
Hi all! I'm trying to use roc format --stdin --stdout but that command specifically seems to not be applying any formatting changes. Feels like a bug, but maybe I'm misusing the command?

I put more details in this GH issue: https://github.com/roc-lang/roc/issues/6088

Any help would be appreciated, thanks!

Yes, seems like a bug, thanks for reporting!
I've suggested a fix in the issue.
Becker A. has marked this topic as resolved.
